Friday Night Funkin' is a popular rhythm game that has taken the internet by storm. The game features a simple premise: players must tap the right arrow keys to match the beat of the music and win the love of their girlfriend's father. Since its release, the game has inspired countless mods, each adding their unique spin to the gameplay. In this review, we'll take a closer look at one of the most popular mods, Vs Tord.

## What is Vs Tord?

Vs Tord is a mod that adds a new character to the game, Tord. Tord is a character from the webcomic "Eddsworld" and has now made his way into the world of Friday Night Funkin'. In this mod, players can face off against Tord in three challenging songs that will test their rhythm skills. 

## Gameplay

The gameplay in Vs Tord is typical of the standard Friday Night Funkin' game with the addition of Tord as the opponent. The songs included are "Gun", "Ow Nou", and "The End", each with a unique beat that will keep players on their feet. While the gameplay may seem straightforward, the difficulty of the mod ramps up with each song. The final song, "The End", is particularly challenging, with a song that starts off deceptively easy before quickly speeding up.

## Graphics and Sound

One of the most noticeable aspects of Vs Tord is the unique graphics and sound design. The mod features new character sprites for Tord and his band and remixes of Eddsworld's music, making the experience feel fresh and exciting. The mod also features custom animations, adding an extra layer of polish to the gameplay.

## Conclusion

If you're a fan of Friday Night Funkin' and looking for a new challenge, Vs Tord is definitely worth checking out. The mod adds a new character to the game and features challenging songs that will keep players coming back for more. With unique graphics and sound design, the mod feels like a fresh take on the classic game. Overall, we highly recommend giving Vs Tord a try.
